typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesADLS
MoviesADLS select(mapColumn(
		MovieID = Column_1,
		MovieTitle = Column_2,
		Genre = Column_3,
		ReleaseYear = Column_4,
		Column5 = Column_5,
		RottenTomatoesRating = Column_6
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
